trans-unit.source: If the material has the RequiresFullMatrix flag set, this is guaranteed to be the complete transform matrix calculated from the scenegraph.

trans-unit.source: If the menu is opened in a position where some of its menu items would be outside of boundingItem, it is automatically moved to a position where they will not be hidden. By default, the boundingItem is set to the parent of the menu. It can also be set to null to prevent this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果在某些菜单项位于boundingItem之外的位置打开菜单，则会自动将其移至不会隐藏的位置。默认情况下，boundingItem设置为菜单的父级。也可以将其设置为 null 以防止此行为。

trans-unit.source: If the menu item doesn't have a shortcut, it will just contain the menu item's text. The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单项没有快捷方式,它将只包含菜单项的文本。默认值是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the menu item is checkable, this property reflects its checked state. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单项是可检查的，则此属性反映其选中状态。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If the menu would not fit on the screen, the other direction is used automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单不适合在屏幕上显示,则会自动使用另一个方向。

trans-unit.target: 如果网格是MeshUserDefined，则还必须设置userDefinedMesh属性，以使项目正确呈现。默认值取决于图形类型。

trans-unit.target: 如果模型是一棵树,父母也会被转置。例如,如果源模型中的索引的父级是`index(2,0)`,那么在代理模型中它的父级是`index(0,2)`。

trans-unit.source: If the model is already populated with data from a database, the model re-selects it with the new filter. Otherwise, the filter will be applied the next time select() is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果该模型已经用数据库中的数据填充，则该模型将使用新的过滤器重新选择它。否则，过滤器将在下次调用select（）时应用。

trans-unit.source: If the model is not initialized, an empty record will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型没有被初始化,将返回一个空记录。

trans-unit.source: If the model is sorted on the column and role that are used for completion, you can call setModelSorting() with either QCompleter::CaseSensitivelySortedModel or QCompleter::CaseInsensitivelySortedModel as the argument. On large models, this can lead to significant performance improvements, because QCompleter can then use binary search instead of linear search. The binary search only works when the filterMode is Qt::MatchStartsWith.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型在用于完成的列和角色上排序，则可以使用QCompleter :: CaseSensitivelySortedModel或QCompleter :: CaseInsensitivelySortedModel作为参数来调用setModelSorting（）。在大型模型上，这可以显着提高性能，因为QCompleter随后可以使用二进制搜索而不是线性搜索。仅当filterMode为Qt :: MatchStartsWith时，二进制搜索才有效。

trans-unit.source: If the model is sorted on the column and role that are used for completion, you can call setModelSorting() with either QCompleter::CaseSensitivelySortedModel or QCompleter::CaseInsensitivelySortedModel as the argument. On large models, this can lead to significant performance improvements, because QCompleter can then use binary search instead of linear search. The binary search only works when the filterMode is Qt::MatchStartsWith.

If the model's data for the completionColumn() and completionRole() is sorted in ascending order, you can set this property to CaseSensitivelySortedModel or CaseInsensitivelySortedModel. On large models, this can lead to significant performance improvements because the completer object can then use a binary search algorithm instead of linear search algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果完成列（）和完成角色（）的模型数据按升序排序，则可以将此属性设置为CaseSensitivelySortedModel或CaseInsensitivelySortedModel。在大型模型上，这可以导致显着的性能改进，因为完成对象可以使用二进制搜索算法而不是线性搜索算法。

trans-unit.target: 如果配置（）返回的网络配置的类型为QNetworkConfiguration :: ServiceNetwork，则此函数将返回该配置的当前活动子网络配置。否则，返回与配置（）相同的网络配置。

trans-unit.source: If the network is not accessible the network access manager will not process any new network requests, all such requests will fail with an error. Requests with URLs with the file:// scheme will still be processed.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法访问网络，则网络访问管理器将不会处理任何新的网络请求，所有此类请求将失败并显示错误。带有file：//方案的URL的请求仍将被处理。

trans-unit.source: If the new height is less than 0.0 or if this geo rectangle is invalid, the property is not changed. To set up the values of an invalid geo rectangle based on the center, width, and height, you should use setCenter() first to make the geo rectangle valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果新高度小于0.0或此地理矩形无效，则该属性不会更改。要基于中心，宽度和高度设置无效的地理矩形的值，应首先使用setCenter（）使该地理矩形有效。

trans-unit.source: If the new parent widget is in a different window, the reparented widget and its children are appended to the end of the tab chain of the new parent widget, in the same internal order as before. If one of the moved widgets had keyboard focus, setParent() calls clearFocus() for that widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的父窗口小部件位于不同的窗口中，则重做的窗口小部件及其子级将以与以前相同的内部顺序附加到新的父窗口小部件的选项卡链的末尾。如果移动的小部件之一具有键盘焦点，则setParent（）对该小部件调用clearFocus（）。

trans-unit.target: 如果可以创建新窗口，则返回新窗口的QWebEnginePage。否则返回空指针。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is successful, the number of places in the reply matches those in the request. If a particular place in the request is not found, a default constructed place is used as a place holder in the reply. In this way, there is always a one is to one relationship between input places in the request, and output places in the reply.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作成功,回复中的位置数与请求中的位置数相匹配。如果在请求中没有找到特定的位置,则在回复中使用一个默认构造的位置作为占位符。这样一来,请求中的输入位和回复中的输出位之间始终存在着一比一的关系。

trans-unit.source: If the process holding the lock crashes, the lock file stays on disk and can prevent any other process from accessing the shared resource, ever. For this reason, QLockFile tries to detect such a "stale" lock file, based on the process ID written into the file. To cover the situation that the process ID got reused meanwhile, the current process name is compared to the name of the process that corresponds to the process ID from the lock file. If the process names differ, the lock file is considered stale. Additionally, the last modification time of the lock file (30s by default, for the use case of a short-lived operation) is taken into account. If the lock file is found to be stale, it will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果持有锁的进程崩溃，则锁文件将保留在磁盘上，并且可能永远阻止任何其他进程访问共享资源。因此，QLockFile尝试根据写入文件的进程ID来检测这种“过时的”锁定文件。为了解决进程ID同时被重用的情况，将当前进程名称与对应于锁定文件中进程ID的进程名称进行比较。如果进程名称不同，则锁定文件被认为是过时的。此外，还考虑了锁定文件的最后修改时间（对于短暂操作的使用情况，默认为30秒）。如果发现锁定文件已过期，则将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If the process holding the lock crashes, the lock file stays on disk and can prevent any other process from accessing the shared resource, ever. For this reason, QLockFile tries to detect such a "stale" lock file, based on the process ID written into the file. To cover the situation that the process ID got reused meanwhile, the current process name is compared to the name of the process that corresponds to the process ID from the lock file. If the process names differ, the lock file is considered stale. Additionally, the last modification time of the lock file (30s by default, for the use case of a short-lived operation) is taken into account. If the lock file is found to be stale, it will be deleted.

trans-unit.source: If the roaming process is non-seamless the IP address will change which means that a socket becomes invalid. However seamless mobility can ensure that the local IP address does not change. This is achieved by using a virtual IP address which is bound to the actual link address. During the roaming process the virtual address is attached to the new link address.
trans-unit.target: 如果漫游过程是非无缝的,那么IP地址就会发生变化,这就意味着一个套接字变得无效。然而无缝移动性可以保证本地IP地址不发生变化。这是通过使用与实际链路地址绑定的虚拟IP地址来实现的。在漫游过程中,虚拟地址被附加到新的链路地址上。

trans-unit.source: If the scene's font changes, either directly through setFont() or indirectly when the application font changes, QGraphicsScene first sends itself a FontChange event, and it then sends FontChange events to all top-level widget items in the scene. These items respond by resolving their own fonts to the scene, and they then notify their children, who again notify their children, and so on, until all widget items have updated their fonts.
trans-unit.target: 如果场景的字体发生更改（直接通过setFont（）或在应用程序字体更改时间接更改），则QGraphicsScene首先向自身发送FontChange事件，然后将FontChange事件发送给场景中的所有顶级窗口小部件项目。这些项目通过将自己的字体解析为场景来进行响应，然后通知其子级，然后再次通知其子级，依此类推，直到所有小部件项都更新了其字体。

trans-unit.source: If the scene's palette changes, either directly through setPalette() or indirectly when the application palette changes, QGraphicsScene first sends itself a PaletteChange event, and it then sends PaletteChange events to all top-level widget items in the scene. These items respond by resolving their own palettes to the scene, and they then notify their children, who again notify their children, and so on, until all widget items have updated their palettes.
trans-unit.target: 如果场景的调色板发生更改（直接通过setPalette（）或在应用程序调色板发生更改时间接更改），则QGraphicsScene首先向自身发送一个PaletteChange事件，然后将PaletteChange事件发送给场景中的所有顶级控件。这些项目通过将自己的调色板解析为场景来做出响应，然后通知其子级，然后再次通知其子级，依此类推，直到所有小部件项目都更新了其调色板。

Similarly, modifying any value in the sequence will cause the sequence data to be read, and then the modification will be performed and the modified sequence will be written back to the QObject's property.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列作为Q_PROPERTY公开，则按索引访问序列中的任何值将导致从QObject的属性读取序列数据，然后进行读取。同样，修改序列中的任何值将导致读取序列数据，然后将执行修改并将修改后的序列写回到QObject的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the sequence is returned from a Q_INVOKABLE function, access and mutation is much cheaper, as no QObject property read or write occurs; instead, the C++ sequence data is accessed and modified directly.

trans-unit.source: If the underlying database engine supports transactions, QSqlDriver::hasFeature(QSqlDriver::Transactions) will return true. You can use QSqlDatabase::transaction() to initiate a transaction, followed by the SQL commands you want to execute within the context of the transaction, and then either QSqlDatabase::commit() or QSqlDatabase::rollback(). When using transactions you must start the transaction before you create your query.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础数据库引擎支持事务，则QSqlDriver :: hasFeature（QSqlDriver :: Transactions）将返回true。您可以使用QSqlDatabase :: transaction（）启动事务，然后使用要在事务上下文中执行的SQL命令，然后使用QSqlDatabase :: commit（）或QSqlDatabase :: rollback（）。使用事务时，必须在创建查询之前启动事务。

trans-unit.source: If the user edits the text in a fragment and introduces a different character format, the fragment's text will be split at each point where the format changes, and new fragments will be created. For example, changing the style of some text in the middle of a sentence will cause the fragment to be broken into three separate fragments: the first and third with the same format as before, and the second with the new style. The first fragment will contain the text from the beginning of the sentence, the second will contain the text from the middle, and the third takes the text from the end of the sentence.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户对片段中的文本进行编辑,并引入不同的字符格式,那么片段中的文本将在每一个改变格式的地方被分割,并创建新的片段。例如,在一个句子中间改变某些文本的样式,将导致该片段被分解成三个独立的片段:第一个和第三个与之前的格式相同,第二个则采用新的样式。第一个片段将包含句子开头的文字,第二个片段将包含中间的文字,第三个片段则是句子结尾的文字。

trans-unit.source: If the user presses Back, cleanupPage() is called (which in turn calls QWizardPage::cleanupPage()). trans-unit.source: If there are no Qt signals, and you are writing the test as part of developing a new API, consider whether the API could benefit from the addition of a signal that reports the completion of the asynchronous behavior.

If there are no Qt signals, use the QTRY_COMPARE() and QTRY_VERIFY() macros, which periodically test a specified condition until it becomes true or some maximum timeout is reached. These macros prevent the test from taking longer than necessary, while avoiding breakages when tests are written on workstations and later executed on embedded platforms.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set QNetworkSession can provide statistics about transmitted and received data.
If this flag is set the platform requires that a network session is created before network operations can be performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了该标志,平台要求在进行网络操作前必须先创建网络会话。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set the underlying platform ensures that a network interface is not shut down until the last network session has been closed(). This works across multiple processes. If the platform session support is missing this API can only ensure the above behavior for network sessions within the same process. In general mobile platforms have such support whereas most desktop platform lack this capability.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此标志，则基础平台将确保在最后一个网络会话被关闭之前，不关闭网络接口。这适用于多个流程。如果缺少平台会话支持，则此API仅可确保同一进程内的网络会话具有上述行为。通常，移动平台具有这种支持，而大多数桌面平台都缺乏此功能。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个选项,数字到字符串函数将不会在其返回值中插入分组分隔符。默认值是插入分组分隔符。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the number-to-string functions will not pad exponents with zeroes when printing floating point numbers in scientific notation. The default is to add one leading zero to single digit exponents.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个选项,当打印科学记数法中的浮点数字时,数字到字符串函数将不会用零来填充指数。默认情况下是给个位数指数加一个前导零。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the number-to-string functions will pad numbers with zeroes to the requested precision in "g" or "most concise" mode, even if the number of significant digits is lower than the requested precision. The default is to omit trailing zeroes.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个选项,在 "g "或 "最简洁 "模式下,数字到字符串的函数将用零来填充数字到所要求的精度,即使有意义的数字数量低于所要求的精度。默认情况下是省略尾部的零。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the standard quotation marks will be used to quote strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个选项,将使用标准引号来引用字符串。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the string-to-number functions will fail if they encounter an exponent padded with zeroes when parsing a floating point number in scientific notation. The default is to accept such padding.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个选项,那么在解析科学记数法中的浮点数时,如果遇到用零填充的指数,字符串到数字函数将失败。默认值是接受这种填充。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the string-to-number functions will fail if they encounter group separators in their input. The default is to accept numbers containing correctly placed group separators.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个选项,字符串转数字函数在输入中遇到分组分隔符时将失败。默认情况下,接受包含正确放置的分组分隔符的数字。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set, the string-to-number functions will fail if they encounter trailing zeroes after the decimal dot when parsing a number in scientific or decimal representation. The default is to accept trailing zeroes.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个选项,当解析科学或十进制表示的数字时,如果在小数点后遇到尾部的零,字符串到数字函数将失败。默认值是接受尾部的零。

trans-unit.source: If this option is true, the branch and any decorations on selected items should be highlighted, indicating that the item is selected; otherwise, no highlighting is required. The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果该选项为真,则应高亮显示所选项目上的分支和任何装饰,表示该项目已被选中;否则,无需高亮显示。默认值为false。

trans-unit.source: If this point has been grabbed by a Pointer Handler or an Item, it means that object has taken sole responsibility for handling the movement and the release if this point. In that case, this is the position at which the grab occurred, in the coordinate system of the scene graph.

If this point has been grabbed by a Pointer Handler or an Item, it means that object has taken sole responsibility for handling the movement and the release if this point. In that case, this is the position at which the grab occurred, in the coordinate system of the scene graph.
trans-unit.target: 如果此点已被Pointer Handler或Item抓住，则意味着该对象将完全负责处理移动和释放。在这种情况下，这是场景图的坐标系中发生抓取的位置。

trans-unit.source: If this property is LeftToRight, the items will be laid out left to right. If the isWrapping property is true, the layout will wrap when it reaches the right side of the visible area. If this property is TopToBottom, the items will be laid out from the top of the visible area, wrapping when it reaches the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为LeftToRight，则项目将从左到右布置。如果isWrapping属性为 true ，则布局到达可见区域的右侧时将对其进行换行。如果此属性为TopToBottom，则将从可见区域的顶部开始排列项目，并在到达底部时进行环绕。

trans-unit.source: If this property is Adjust, the items will be laid out again when the view is resized. If the value is Fixed, the items will not be laid out when the view is resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为Adjust，则在调整视图大小时将重新布置项目。如果值为Fixed，则调整视图大小时将不会对项目进行布局。

trans-unit.source: If this property is false (the default), the minimum and maximum will be shown in its classic position for the inherited widget. If the value is true, the minimum and maximum appear at their opposite location.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 false （默认值），则最小值和最大值将以其继承的窗口小部件的经典位置显示。如果值为true，则最小值和最大值将出现在它们的相反位置。

trans-unit.source: If this property is false, dock areas can only contain a single row (horizontal or vertical) of dock widgets. If this property is true, the area occupied by a dock widget can be split in either direction to contain more dock widgets.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 false ，则停靠区只能包含一行（水平或垂直）停靠小部件。如果此属性为 true ，则可以在任一方向上拆分停靠窗口小部件占用的区域，以包含更多停靠窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: If this property is false, scrolling the mouse wheel "up" and using keys like page up will increase the slider's value towards its maximum. Otherwise pressing page up will move value towards the slider's minimum.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 false ，则将鼠标滚轮“向上”滚动并使用向上翻页之类的键会将滑块的值增加到最大值。否则，按向上翻页将把值移向滑块的最小值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is false, the resulting opacity is the source alpha multiplied with the mask alpha, As * Am.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 false ，则结果不透明度为源alpha乘以蒙版alpha As * Am 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is false, the series is not rendered. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 false ，则不呈现该系列。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is false, then all actions in the group are disabled. If this property is true, all actions in the group are enabled, unless explicitly disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 false ，则禁用该组中的所有操作。如果此属性为 true ，则除非明确禁用，否则将启用组中的所有操作。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true a grid is drawn for the table; if the property is false, no grid is drawn. The default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则为表格绘制一个网格；如果该属性为 false ，则不绘制网格。默认值是true。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true all columns will show focus, otherwise only one column will show focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ,则所有列将显示焦点，否则仅一列将显示焦点。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true the treeview will animate expansion and collapsing of branches. If this property is false, the treeview will expand or collapse branches immediately without showing the animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ,则树视图将为分支的扩展和折叠动画。如果此属性为 false ，则树视图将立即展开或折叠分支，而不会显示动画。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true then button in the top-left corner of the table view is enabled. Clicking on this button will select all the cells in the table view.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ,则启用表视图左上角的按钮。单击此按钮将选择表视图中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true then label text is wrapped where necessary at word-breaks; otherwise it is not wrapped at all.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ,则在断词时在必要时包装标签文本；否则，它根本不会被包装。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true then the item text is wrapped where necessary at word-breaks; otherwise it is not wrapped at all. This property is false by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ,则在断字时将项目文本包装在必要的位置；否则，它根本不会被包装。默认情况下，此属性为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true then the item text is wrapped where necessary at word-breaks; otherwise it is not wrapped at all. This property is true by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ,则在断字时将项目文本包装在必要的位置；否则，它根本不会被包装。默认情况下，此属性为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true then the selection rectangle is visible; otherwise it will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ,则选择矩形可见；否则，显示为矩形。否则它将被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, checked will be false.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则选中的将为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, existing text is overwritten, character-for-character by new text; otherwise, text is inserted at the cursor position, displacing existing text.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则现有文本将被新文本覆盖，以字符为单位；否则，将文本插入光标位置，替换现有文本。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, sorting is enabled for the list; if the property is false, sorting is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则对列表启用排序；如果该属性为false，则不启用排序。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, sorting is enabled for the table. If this property is false, sorting is not enabled. The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则为表启用排序。如果此属性为 false ，则不启用排序。默认值为false。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, sorting is enabled for the tree; if the property is false, sorting is not enabled. The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则对树启用排序；如果该属性为false，则不启用排序。默认值为false。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the applications quits when the last visible primary window (i.e. window with no parent) is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则在关闭最后一个可见的主窗口（即没有父窗口）时，应用程序退出。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the button is pressed down. The signals pressed() and clicked() are not emitted if you set this property to true. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则按下按钮。如果将此属性设置为true，则不会发出按下（）和单击（）的信号。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the group box displays its title using a checkbox in place of an ordinary label. If the checkbox is checked, the group box's children are enabled; otherwise, they are disabled and inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则组框使用复选框代替普通标签显示其标题。如果选中该复选框，则启用该组框的子级；否则，它们将被禁用且无法访问。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the header is not shown otherwise it is. The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则不显示标题。默认值为false。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the item background will be drawn using QPalette::Base and QPalette::AlternateBase; otherwise the background will be drawn using the QPalette::Base color.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则将使用QPalette :: Base和QPalette :: AlternateBase绘制项目背景；否则将使用QPalette :: Base颜色绘制背景。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the item will be as tall as possible while respecting the given constraints. If the property is false, the item will have a fixed height set to the preferred height. The default is false, except for layouts themselves, which default to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则在遵守给定约束的情况下，商品将尽可能高。如果该属性为 false ，则该项目的固定高度将设置为首选高度。除布局本身（默认为 true )外，默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the item will be as wide as possible while respecting the given constraints. If the property is false, the item will have a fixed width set to the preferred width. The default is false, except for layouts themselves, which default to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则在遵守给定约束的情况下，项目将尽可能宽。如果该属性为 false ，则该项目的固定宽度将设置为首选宽度。除布局本身（默认为 true )外，默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the progress bar grows in the other direction (e.g. from right to left). By default, the progress bar is not inverted.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则进度条将沿另一个方向（例如，从右到左）增长。默认情况下，进度条不反转。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the resulting opacity is the source alpha multiplied with the inverse of the mask alpha, As * (1 - Am).
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则得到的不透明度为源alpha乘以蒙版alpha的倒数 As * (1 - Am) 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, then only one action in the group can be checked at any given time. The user can trigger any action to check it, and that action will replace the existing one as the checked action in the group.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则在任何给定时间只能检查组中的一个动作。用户可以触发任何动作来进行检查，并且该动作将替换现有的动作作为组中的选中动作。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, then only one button in the group can be checked at any given time. The user can click on any button to check it, and that button will replace the existing one as the checked button in the group.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，则在任何给定时间只能检查组中的一个按钮。用户可以单击任何按钮进行检查，该按钮将替换现有的按钮作为组中的选中按钮。

trans-unit.source: If this property is changed, all instances using the old delegate will be destroyed and new instances will be created using the new delegate.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改此属性,所有使用旧委托的实例将被销毁,并使用新委托创建新实例。

trans-unit.source: If this property is enabled for a group box, it will also be initially checked to ensure that its contents are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为组框启用了该属性,则也会在初始时选中该属性,以确保其内容被启用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is enabled, pressing a non-modifier key will cause a date edit to popup if the calendar widget has focus, allowing the user to specify a date in the form specified by the current locale.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用此属性,如果日历小组件有焦点,按非修改器键将导致弹出日期编辑,允许用户以当前语言环境指定的形式指定日期。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, a default animation is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果不设置此属性,则应用默认动画。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the target defaults to the parent of the Connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则 target 默认为Connection的父级。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the default is the QWidget::font.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则默认值为QWidget :: font。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the default is whatever is set for in the widget's palette for the QWidget::foregroundRole (typically black).
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则默认值为在QWidget :: foregroundRole的小部件选项板中设置的值（通常为黑色）。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the default value is whatever is set for the palette's AlternateBase role.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则默认值是为调色板的AlternateBase角色设置的任何值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the default value is whatever is set for the palette's Highlight role.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则默认值是为调色板的“ 突出显示”角色设置的任何值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the default value is whatever is set for the palette's HighlightedText role.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则默认值是为调色板的HighlightedText角色设置的任何值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, then spacing is used for the column spacing.
trans-unit.target: 如果不设置此属性,则使用列间距。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, then spacing is used for the row spacing.
trans-unit.target: 如果不设置此属性,则使用行距。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定此属性,则默认为0。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to color (i.e., the widget's foreground color).
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为颜色（即，小部件的前景色）。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to color (i.e., the widget's foreground color).
If this property is not specified, it defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to none.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为 none 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to relative.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为 relative 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to a value that depends on the subcontrol.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性,则默认为取决于子控件的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to a value that depends on the subcontrol/widget and on the current style.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定此属性,则默认为取决于子控件/widget和当前样式的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to the value specified by the current style for the SH_DialogButtonLayout style hint.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为SH_DialogBu​​ttonLayout样式提示的当前样式指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to the value specified by the current style for the SH_ItemView_ShowDecorationSelected style hint.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为SH_ItemView_ShowDecorationSelected样式提示的当前样式指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to the value specified by the current style for the SH_LineEdit_PasswordCharacter style hint.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为SH_LineEdit_PasswordCharacter样式提示的当前样式指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to the value specified by the current style for the SH_LineEdit_PasswordMaskDelay style hint.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为SH_LineEdit_PasswordMaskDelay样式提示的当前样式指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to the value specified by the current style for the SH_MessageBox_TextInteractionFlags style hint.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为SH_MessageBox_TextInteractionFlags样式提示的当前样式指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to the value specified by the current style for the SH_Table_GridLineColor style hint.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为SH_Table_GridLineColor样式提示的当前样式指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to the value specified by the current style for the SH_ToolTipLabel_Opacity style hint.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为SH_ToolTipLabel_Opacity样式提示的当前样式指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, it defaults to the value specified by the current style for the SH_Widget_Animation_Duration style hint.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认为SH_Widget_Animation_Duration样式提示的当前样式指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the alignment is topleft.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则对准 top left 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the background image is repeated in both directions (repeat).
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则在两个方向上 repeat 背景图像（repeat）。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the default is border.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认值为 border 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the default is padding.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，则默认值为 padding 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the default value depends on the widget and on the current style.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性,则默认值取决于小组件和当前样式。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the minimum height is derived based on the widget's contents and the style.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性,则根据小组件的内容和样式导出最小高度。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the minimum width is derived based on the widget's contents and the style.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性,则根据小组件的内容和样式导出最小宽度。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to 1, the buttons of a QDialogButtonBox show icons; if it is set to 0, the icons are not shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为1，则QDialogBu​​ttonBox的按钮将显示图标；否则，QDialogBu​​ttonBox的按钮将显示图标。如果设置为0，则不显示图标。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to DoubleValidator.ScientificNotation, the written number may have an exponent part (e.g. 1.5E-2).
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为DoubleValidator .ScientificNotation，则书写的数字可能具有指数部分（例如1.5E-2）。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to SizeRootObjectToView, the view will automatically resize the root item to the size of the view.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为SizeRootObjectToView，则视图将自动将根项目的大小调整为视图的大小。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to SizeViewToRootObject (the default), the view resizes to the size of the root item in the QML.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为SizeViewToRootObject（默认值），则视图将调整为QML中根项目的大小。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to SizeRootObjectToView, the view will automatically resize the root item to the size of the view.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为SizeRootObjectToView，则视图将自动将根项目的大小调整为视图的大小。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to SizeViewToRootObject (the default), the view resizes to the size of the root item in the QML.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为SizeViewToRootObject（默认值），则视图将调整为QML中根项目的大小。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to Qt.KeyboardModifierMask (the default value), then the PointerHandler ignores the modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为 Qt.KeyboardModifierMask （默认值），则PointerHandler会忽略修饰键。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to false, the item will no longer receive mouse events, but will continue to receive key events and will retain the keyboard focus if it has been set. (In contrast, setting the enabled property to false stops both mouse and keyboard events, and also removes focus from the item.)
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为 false ，则该项目将不再接收鼠标事件，但将继续接收键事件，并且如果已设置，则将保留键盘焦点。（相反，将enabled属性设置为 false 会停止鼠标和键盘事件，并且还会从该项目上移开焦点。）

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to false, the item will no longer receive mouse events, but will continue to receive key events and will retain the keyboard focus if it has been set. (In contrast, setting the enabled property to false stops both mouse and keyboard events, and also removes focus from the item.)
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为 false ，则该项目将不再接收鼠标事件，但将继续接收键事件，并且如果已设置，则将保留键盘焦点。（相反，将enabled属性设置为 false 会停止鼠标和键盘事件，并且还会从该项目上移开焦点。）

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to true, such errors are ignored. This is useful if you intend to connect to different types of objects, handling a different set of signals for each object.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为 true ，则将忽略此类错误。如果您打算连接到不同类型的对象，为每个对象处理不同的信号集，则这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to true, the pressAndHold() signal will not be emitted.
If this property is set to true, the text cannot be edited by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为 true ，则无法通过用户交互来编辑文本。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to Text.ElideRight, it can be used with wrapped text. The text will only elide if maximumLineCount, or height has been set. If both maximumLineCount and height are set, maximumLineCount will apply unless the lines do not fit in the height allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性设置为Text.ElideRight，它可以被用来包裹文本。仅当设置了 maximumLineCount 或 height 时，文本才会消失。如果同时设置了 maximumLineCount 和 height ，则除非线不适合允许的高度，否则 maximumLineCount 将适用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a geocircle its radius property may be left unset, in which case the Plugin will choose an appropriate radius for the search.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为Geocircle，则可以不设置其radius属性，在这种情况下，插件将为搜索选择合适的半径。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a positive value, the minimumSizeHint() and sizeHint() take it into account.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为正值，则将minimumSizeHint（）和sizeHint（）考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a string with more than one character, the first character is used. If the string is empty, the value is ignored and the property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性被设置为一个有多个字符的字符串,则使用第一个字符。如果字符串为空,则忽略该值,不设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a value other than invalidSelectionPoint(), the graph tries to match a graph position to the specified coordinates within the primary viewport. After the rendering pass, this property is returned to its default state of invalidSelectionPoint(). The queried graph position can be read from the QAbstract3DGraph::queriedGraphPosition property after the next render pass.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为invalidSelectionPoint（）以外的值，则图形将尝试将图形位置与主视口内的指定坐标进行匹配。渲染传递之后，此属性返回其默认状态invalidSelectionPoint（）。在下一个渲染过程之后，可以从QAbstract3DGraph :: queriedGraphPosition属性读取查询的图形位置。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a value other than invalidSelectionPoint(), the graph tries to select a data item, axis label, or a custom item at the specified coordinates within the primary viewport. After the rendering pass, the property is returned to its default state of invalidSelectionPoint().
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为invalidSelectionPoint（）以外的值，则图形将尝试在主视口内的指定坐标处选择数据项，轴标签或自定义项。渲染通过后，该属性返回其默认状态invalidSelectionPoint（）。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to false (the default), the scroll area honors the size of its widget. Regardless of this property, you can programmatically resize the widget using widget()->resize(), and the scroll area will automatically adjust itself to the new size.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为false（默认值），则滚动区域将遵循其小部件的大小。无论此属性如何，都可以使用widget（）-> resize（）以编程方式调整其大小，并且滚动区域会自动将其自身调整为新的大小。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to false, the directory model will allow renaming, copying and deleting of files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为false,则目录模型将允许重命名、复制和删除文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to false, the directory model will make sure that a directory actually containes any files before reporting that it has children. Otherwise the directory model will report that an item has children if the item is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性被设置为 false,则目录模型将在报告它有子项目之前确保目录确实包含任何文件。否则,如果一个项目是一个目录,目录模型将报告该项目有子项目。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to true (the default), the QAbstractItemView automatically scrolls the contents of the view if the user drags within 16 pixels of the viewport edge. If the current item changes, then the view will scroll automatically to ensure that the current item is fully visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为true（默认值），则当用户在视口边缘的16个像素内拖动时，QAbstractItemView会自动滚动视图的内容。如果当前项目更改，则视图将自动滚动以确保当前项目完全可见。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to true then the push button is an auto default button.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为true,那么按钮就是自动默认按钮。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to true, the layout will use design metrics. Otherwise, the metrics of the paint device as set on QAbstractTextDocumentLayout::setPaintDevice() will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为true，则布局将使用设计指标。否则，将使用在QAbstractTextDocumentLayout :: setPaintDevice（）上设置的绘画设备的度量。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to true, the scroll area will automatically resize the widget in order to avoid scroll bars where they can be avoided, or to take advantage of extra space.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为 "true",则滚动区域将自动调整小组件的大小,以便在可以避免滚动条的地方避免滚动条,或利用额外的空间。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to true, then when the mouse or touchpoint moves far enough to begin dragging the content, the content will jump, such that the content pixel which was under the cursor or touchpoint when pressed remains under that point.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为true,那么当鼠标或触摸点移动到足够远的地方开始拖动内容时,内容就会跳动,使按下时在光标或触摸点下的内容像素仍在该点下。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set, it will require the given keyboard modifiers to be pressed in order to react to pointer events, and otherwise ignore them.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此属性,则需要按下给定的键盘修饰符才能对指针事件做出反应,否则将忽略它们。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true (the default value), the highlight is moved smoothly to follow the current item. Otherwise, the highlight is not moved by the view, and any movement must be implemented by the highlight.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为真(默认值),则高光将平滑地移动到当前项的后面。否则,高光不会被视图移动,任何移动都必须由高光来实现。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, all modes previously added are replaced by a mode that matches window size and screen refresh rate.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性为真,则之前添加的所有模式都会被与窗口大小和屏幕刷新率相匹配的模式所取代。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, mipmaps are generated for the texture.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为真,则会为纹理生成mipmaps。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the sourceItem is hidden, though it will still be rendered into the texture. As opposed to hiding the sourceItem by setting visible to false, setting this property to true will not prevent mouse or keyboard input from reaching sourceItem. The property is useful when the ShaderEffectSource is anchored on top of, and meant to replace the sourceItem.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为true，则sourceItem将被隐藏，尽管它仍将呈现到纹理中。与通过将visible设置为false 来隐藏sourceItem相比，将此属性设置为true不会阻止鼠标或键盘输入到达sourceItem。当ShaderEffectSource锚定在sourceItem之上并用于替换sourceItem时，此属性很有用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the group box displays its title using a checkbox in place of an ordinary label. If the checkbox is checked, the group box's children are enabled; otherwise, they are disabled and inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为真,则组框使用复选框代替普通标签显示其标题。如果复选框被选中,则组框的子代就会被启用;否则,它们就会被禁用,无法访问。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the input language is only changed between the languages providing custom layout.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为真,则输入语言只在提供自定义布局的语言之间改变。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the output from the fragmentShader is blended with the background using source-over blend mode. If false, the background is disregarded. Blending decreases the performance, so you should set this property to false when blending is not needed. The default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为true，则使用源覆盖混合模式将fragmentShader的输出与背景混合。如果为假，则忽略背景。混合会降低性能，因此在不需要混合时，应将此属性设置为false。默认值是true。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the texture is updated whenever the sourceItem updates. Otherwise, it will be a frozen image, even if sourceItem is assigned a new item. The property is true by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为true，则每当sourceItem更新时，纹理就会更新。否则，即使为sourceItem分配了新项目，它也将是冻结图像。该属性默认为true。

trans-unit.source: If this property is used, then the value of source will be ignored.
If this property isn't explicitly set, this property defaults to the lowest page ID in this wizard, or -1 if no page has been inserted yet.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有明确设置该属性,则该属性默认为该向导中最低的页面ID,如果还没有插入页面,则默认为-1。

trans-unit.source: If this property of a TableView is set to another TableView, both the tables will synchronize with regard to flicking, column widths/row heights, and spacing according to syncDirection.

If this property value is true, alphaMultiplier is only applied to texels that already have some transparency. If it is false, the multiplier is applied to the alpha value of all texels. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性值为 true ，则alphaMultiplier仅应用于已经具有一定透明度的纹理像素。如果为 false ，则将乘数应用于所有纹理像素的alpha值。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is true, alphaMultiplier is only applied to texels that already have some transparency. If it is false, the multiplier is applied to the alpha value of all texels. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性值为 true ，则alphaMultiplier仅应用于已经具有一定透明度的纹理像素。如果为 false ，则将乘数应用于所有纹理像素的alpha值。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is true, a high definition shader is used to render the volume. If it is false, a low definition shader is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性值为 true ，则使用高清晰度着色器渲染体积。如果为 false ，则使用低清晰度着色器。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is true, a high definition shader is used. If it is false, a low definition shader is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性值为 true ，则使用高清晰度着色器。如果为 false ，则使用低清晰度着色器。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is true, the frames of slices indicated by slice index properties will be drawn around the volume. If it is false, no slice frames will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性值为 true ，则将在体积周围绘制由切片索引属性指示的切片帧。如果为 false ，则不会绘制任何切片框架。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is true, the frames of slices indicated by slice index properties will be drawn around the volume. If it is false, no slice frames will be drawn. Drawing slice frames is independent of drawing slices, so you can show the full volume and still draw the slice frames around it. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性值为 true ，则将在体积周围绘制由切片索引属性指示的切片帧。如果为 false ，则不会绘制任何切片框架。工程图切片框架独立于工程图切片，因此您可以显示完整的体积，但仍围绕其绘制工程图框架。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is true, the slices indicated by slice index properties will be drawn instead of the full volume. If it is false, the full volume will always be drawn. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性值为 true ，则将绘制切片索引属性指示的切片而不是整个体积。如果为 false ，将始终提取全部体积。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is set to true, the parent axis sub-segment count is ignored when calculating sub-grid line positions. The sub-grid positions are generated automatically according to the base property value. The number of sub-grid lines is set to the base value minus one, rounded down. This property is ignored when the base value is zero. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性值设置为 true ，则在计算子网格线位置时将忽略父轴子段计数。根据基本属性值自动生成子网格位置。子网格线的数量设置为基值减一，四舍五入。当基值为零时，将忽略此属性。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is set to true, the parent axis sub-segment count is ignored when calculating sub-grid line positions. The sub-grid positions are generated automatically according to the base property value. The number of sub-grid lines is set to the base value minus one, rounded down. This property is ignored when the base value is zero. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性值设置为 true ，则在计算子网格线位置时将忽略父轴子段计数。根据基本属性值自动生成子网格位置。子网格线的数量设置为基值减一，四舍五入。当基值为零时，将忽略此属性。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If this quaternion is null, then a null quaternion is returned. If the length of the quaternion is very close to 1, then the quaternion will be returned as-is. Otherwise the normalized form of the quaternion of length 1 will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个四元数是空的,那么返回一个空的四元数,如果四元数的长度非常接近1,那么将按原样返回。如果四元数的长度非常接近于1,那么将按原样返回四元数,否则将返回长度为1的四元数的标准化形式。否则将返回长度为1的四元数的归一化形式。

trans-unit.source: If this query is invalid, false is returned and the behavior is undefined. If
trans-unit.target: 如果此查询无效，则返回 false ，并且行为未定义。如果

trans-unit.source: If this role is not defined, columnRole is used to determine the X-coordinate value of the resolved QSurfaceDataItem objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义此角色，则columnRole用于确定已解析的QSurfaceDataItem对象的X坐标值。

trans-unit.source: If this role is not defined, rowRole is used to determine the Z-coordinate value of resolved QSurfaceDataItem objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义此角色，则使用rowRole确定已解析的QSurfaceDataItem对象的Z坐标值。

trans-unit.source: If this routing manager supports returning addresses and instructions in different languages, they will be returned in the language of
trans-unit.target: 如果该路由管理器支持以不同的语言返回地址和指令,那么它们将以以下语言返回

trans-unit.source: If this semaphore releaser had the responsibility to call some QSemaphore::release() itself, it performs the call before taking over from
trans-unit.target: 如果此信号量释放器负责调用某些QSemaphore :: release（）本身，则它将在从

trans-unit.source: If this series is added to a graph, the graph can adjust the selection according to user interaction or if it becomes invalid. Selecting a bar on another added series will also clear the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个系列被添加到图形中,图形可以根据用户的交互或者无效的情况调整选区。在另一个添加的系列上选择条形图,也会清除选区。

trans-unit.source: If this server is using QNetworkProxy then the
trans-unit.target: 如果此服务器正在使用QNetworkProxy，则

trans-unit.source: If this setting is changed while a sound effect is playing it will only take effect when the sound effect has stopped playing.
trans-unit.target: 如果在播放声音效果时更改此设置,则只有在停止播放声音效果时才会生效。

trans-unit.source: If this signal is not handled, the requested load will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果该信号未被处理,则请求的负载将失败。

trans-unit.source: If this string contains any characters that cannot be encoded in the locale, the returned byte array is undefined. Those characters may be suppressed or replaced by another.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个字符串包含任何不能在locale中编码的字符,返回的字节数组是未定义的。这些字符可能会被抑制或被其他字符取代。

trans-unit.source: If this test fails, it will give no clue as to why the file failed to open:

If this true the animation will complete its current iteration when it is stopped - either by setting the running property to false, or by calling the stop() method. The complete() method is not effected by this value.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则动画将在停止时完成其当前迭​​代-通过将 running 属性设置为false或调用 stop() 方法。的 complete() 方法不受这个值来实现。

trans-unit.source: If this value is greater than zero, the view may keep as many delegates instantiated as it can fit within the buffer specified. For example, if in a vertical view the delegate is 20 pixels high and cacheBuffer is set to 40, then up to 2 delegates above and 2 delegates below the visible area may be created/retained. The buffered delegates are created asynchronously, allowing creation to occur across multiple frames and reducing the likelihood of skipping frames. In order to improve painting performance delegates outside the visible area are not painted.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值大于零，则视图可以保留实例化的委托，使其可以容纳在指定缓冲区中。例如，如果在垂直视图中，委托高度为20像素，并且 cacheBuffer 设置为40，则可以在可见区域上方最多创建2个委托，在可见区域下方最多保留2个委托。缓冲的委托是异步创建的，从而允许跨多个帧进行创建，并减少了跳过帧的可能性。为了提高绘画性能，不对可见区域之外的代表进行绘画。

trans-unit.source: If this value is greater than zero, the view may keep as many delegates instantiated as will fit within the buffer specified. For example, if in a vertical view the delegate is 20 pixels high, there are 3 columns and cacheBuffer is set to 40, then up to 6 delegates above and 6 delegates below the visible area may be created/retained. The buffered delegates are created asynchronously, allowing creation to occur across multiple frames and reducing the likelihood of skipping frames. In order to improve painting performance delegates outside the visible area are not painted.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值大于零，则该视图可能会保留实例化的委托，该委托将与指定缓冲区中容纳的委托数量一样多。例如，如果在垂直视图中委托为20像素高，有3列，并且 cacheBuffer 设置为40，则可以创建/保留可见区域上方的6个委托和下方的6个委托。缓冲的委托是异步创建的，从而允许跨多个帧进行创建，并减少了跳过帧的可能性。为了提高绘画性能，不对可见区域之外的代表进行绘画。

trans-unit.source: If this value is non-zero, the view will create extra delegates before the start of the view, or after the end. The view will create as many delegates as it can fit into the pixel size specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为非零,视图将在视图开始前或结束后创建额外的委托。视图将创建尽可能多的代表,以适应指定的像素大小。

trans-unit.source: If this value is non-zero, then any movement of the emitter will provide additional starting velocity to the particles based on the movement. The additional vector will be the same angle as the emitter's movement, with a magnitude that is the magnitude of the emitters movement multiplied by velocityFromMovement.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个值是非零,那么发射器的任何运动都会根据运动为粒子提供额外的起始速度。额外的矢量将与发射器的运动角度相同,其幅度是发射器运动的幅度乘以velocityFromMovement。

trans-unit.source: If this value is not specified, it defaults to the value that depends on the native style.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定这个值,它默认为取决于本地风格的值。

trans-unit.source: If this value is set when the emitter is loaded, then it will emit particles from the past, up to startTime milliseconds ago. These will simulate as if they were emitted then, but will not have any affectors applied to them. Affectors will take effect from the present time.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个值在发射器加载时被设置,那么它将发射过去的粒子,最多可以达到startTime毫秒前。这些粒子会像当时发射的一样进行模拟,但不会有任何影响器应用到它们身上。影响器将从当前时间开始生效。

trans-unit.source: If this value to null, the bounding volume of the entity is used. Care must be taken that this bounding volume never becomes invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为空,则使用实体的边界体积。必须注意,这个边界体积永远不会失效。

trans-unit.source: If this value to nullptr, the bounding volume of the entity is used. Care must be taken that this bounding volume never becomes invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个值为nullptr,则使用实体的边界体积。必须注意,这个边界体积永远不会失效。

trans-unit.source: If this vector is null, then a null vector is returned. If the length of the vector is very close to 1, then the vector will be returned as-is. Otherwise the normalized form of the vector of length 1 will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个向量为空,那么将返回一个空向量。如果向量的长度非常接近1,那么将按原样返回向量。否则将返回长度为1的向量的归一化形式。

trans-unit.source: If this view item is checkable, i.e., ViewItemFeature::HasCheckIndicator is true, checkState is true if the item is checked; otherwise, it is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果该视图项是可检查的，即ViewItemFeature :: HasCheckIndicator为true，则检查该项目为 checkState ；否则为true。否则，它是错误的。

trans-unit.source: If this volume was not mounted from a subvolume of a larger filesystem or if the subvolume could not be detected, this function returns an empty byte array.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个卷不是从一个更大的文件系统的子卷挂载的,或者如果子卷无法被检测到,这个函数返回一个空的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: If this widget has a layout, the default implementation returns the layout's preferred height. if there is no layout, the default implementation returns -1 indicating that the preferred height does not depend on the width.

trans-unit.source: If we want to use parentheses purely for grouping and not for capturing we can use the non-capturing syntax, e.g. (?:green|blue). Non-capturing parentheses begin '(?:' and end ')'. In this example we match either 'green' or 'blue' but we do not capture the match so we only know whether or not we matched but not which color we actually found. Using non-capturing parentheses is more efficient than using capturing parentheses since the regexp engine has to do less book-keeping.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们只想将括号用于分组而不是用于捕获，则可以使用非捕获语法，例如（？：green | blue）。非捕获括号以'（？：'开始，以'）结尾。在此示例中，我们匹配“绿色”或“蓝色”，但是我们没有捕获匹配项，因此我们只知道是否匹配，但不知道实际找到的颜色。使用非捕获括号比使用捕获括号更有效，因为正则表达式引擎必须减少记账工作。

trans-unit.source: If wrap is true, stepping past to changes the value to from and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 如果包装是 true ，踩着过去到的值变化的，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: If wrapping is true stepping up from maximum() value will take you to the minimum() value and vice versa. Wrapping only make sense if you have minimum() and maximum() values set.
trans-unit.target: 如果wrapping为真,则从maximum()值上移到minimum()值,反之亦然。只有当你设置了最小()和最大()值时,包装才有意义。

trans-unit.source: If you access out of bounds, a zero (null object) is returned and a warning is issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果访问出界,将返回一个零(空对象)并发出警告。

trans-unit.target: 如果使用此方法添加QToolButton，则不会使用工具栏的Qt :: ToolButtonStyle。

trans-unit.source: If you add a child widget to an already visible widget you must explicitly show the child to make it visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将子部件添加到一个已经可见的部件上,您必须明确地显示子部件以使其可见。

trans-unit.source: If you already have a QObject subclass and want an easy optimization, you can use QBasicTimer instead of QTimer. With QBasicTimer, you must reimplement timerEvent() in your QObject subclass and handle the timeout there. The Wiggly example shows how to use QBasicTimer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经有了QObject子类并希望进行简单的优化，则可以使用QBasicTimer而不是QTimer。使用QBasicTimer，您必须在QObject子类中重新实现timerEvent（）并在那里处理超时。该威格利例子展示了如何使用QBasicTimer。

trans-unit.source: If you already have a QObject subclass and want an easy optimization, you can use QBasicTimer instead of QTimer. With QBasicTimer, you must reimplement timerEvent() in your QObject subclass and handle the timeout there. The Wiggly example shows how to use QBasicTimer.

If you already have a fully defined QObject, it can become a Source simply by passing it to QRemoteObjectHostBase::enableRemoting(). This lets other processes/devices create a Replica of the object to interact with (see Remote Object Interaction). You can then instantiate QRemoteObjectDynamicReplicas of your object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经具有完全定义的QObject，只需将其传递到QRemoteObjectHostBase :: enableRemoting（）即可将其变为Source 。这样，其他进程/设备就可以创建要与之交互的对象的副本（请参见Remote Object Interaction）。然后，您可以实例化对象的QRemoteObjectDynamicReplica。

trans-unit.source: If you already have a fully defined QObject, you can use it as a source by passing it to QRemoteObjectHostBase::enableRemoting(). This way, other processes or devices can then create dynamics replicas of the object to interact with.
If you always use the same file you do not need to use QFileSelector.
trans-unit.target: 如果您始终使用同一文件，则无需使用QFileSelector。

You can also call capacity() to find out how much memory QString actually allocated.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在建设一个QString的逐渐提前知道大约有多少个字符的QString将包含，你可以调用储备（），要求QString的预分配一定量的内存。您还可以调用Capacity（）来找出QString实际分配了多少内存。

You can also call capacity() to find out how much memory QString actually allocated.

If you are calling QToolTip::hideText(), or QToolTip::showText() with an empty string, as a result of a ToolTip-event you should also call ignore() on the event, to signal that you don't want to start any tooltip specific modes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用空字符串调用QToolTip :: hideText（）或QToolTip :: showText（），由于ToolTip -event，您还应该在事件上调用ignore（），以表示您不需要启动任何工具提示特定模式。

trans-unit.source: If you are calling a function on an QObject subclass that doesn't live in the current thread and the object might receive events, you must protect all access to your QObject subclass's internal data with a mutex; otherwise, you may experience crashes or other undesired behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在不在当前线程中的QObject子类上调用函数，并且该对象可能接收事件，则必须使用互斥锁保护对QObject子类的内部数据的所有访问；否则，您可能会遇到崩溃或其他不良行为。

trans-unit.target: 如果确定要在指定的文件之后处理变量，则可以传递 -after 选项。指定此选项后， -after 选项之后的命令行上的所有分配都将推迟到解析指定的文件之后。

trans-unit.source: If you are changing the number of columns or rows you do not need to emit this signal, but use the begin/end functions (refer to the section on subclassing in the QAbstractItemModel class description for details).

trans-unit.source: If you are considering defining a new component, it's worth double checking that such a component doesn't already exist in the component set for your platform. Otherwise, you will be forcing the QML engine to generate and store type-data for a type which is essentially a duplicate of another pre-existing and potentially already loaded component.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在考虑定义一个新的组件,那么值得仔细检查一下您的平台的组件集中是否已经存在这样一个组件。否则,您将迫使QML引擎为一个类型生成和存储类型数据,而这个类型本质上是另一个已经存在的、可能已经加载的组件的重复。

trans-unit.source: If you are designing an application which changes its layout depending on device orientation, you probably want to use primaryOrientation to determine the layout. That is because on a desktop computer, you can expect primaryOrientation to change when the user rotates the screen via the operating system's control panel, even if the computer does not contain an accelerometer. Likewise on most handheld computers which do have accelerometers, the operating system will rotate the whole screen automatically, so again you will see the primaryOrientation change.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在设计一个根据设备方向而改变布局的应用程序,你可能想使用primaryOrientation来确定布局,这是因为在台式电脑上,当用户通过操作系统控制面板旋转屏幕时,你可以预期primaryOrientation会改变,即使电脑不包含加速计。这是因为在台式计算机上,当用户通过操作系统的控制面板旋转屏幕时,即使计算机不包含加速计,你也可以预期primaryOrientation会改变。同样,在大多数有加速度计的手持电脑上,操作系统会自动旋转整个屏幕,所以你也会看到primaryOrientation的变化。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing custom widgets and want them to look good on all platforms, you can use QStyle functions to perform parts of the widget drawing, such as drawItemText(), drawItemPixmap(), drawPrimitive(), drawControl(), and drawComplexControl().
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在开发自定义窗口小部件，并希望它们在所有平台上都看起来不错，则可以使用QStyle函数执行窗口小部件绘制的各个部分，例如drawItemText（），drawItemPixmap（），drawPrimitive（），drawControl（）和drawComplexControl（ ）。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing custom widgets and want them to look good on all platforms, you can use QStyle functions to perform parts of the widget drawing, such as drawItemText(), drawItemPixmap(), drawPrimitive(), drawControl(), and drawComplexControl().

If you are experiencing strange problems with using special flags that modify the alignment of structure and union members (such as /Zp2) then you will need to recompile Qt with the flags set for the application as well.

trans-unit.source: If you are extending your own C++ classes to interoperate with VideoOutput, you can either provide a QObject based class with a mediaObject property that exposes a QMediaObject derived class that has a QVideoRendererControl available, or you can provide a QObject based class with a writable videoSurface property that can accept a QAbstractVideoSurface based class and can follow the correct protocol to deliver QVideoFrames to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用扩展自己的C ++类进行互操作VideoOutput，你可以提供一个QObject的一个基于类 mediaObject 暴露属性QMediaObject导出具有类QVideoRendererControl可用，或者你可以提供一个QObject的基于类的可写 videoSurface 属性可以接受基于QAbstractVideoSurface的类，并且可以遵循正确的协议将QVideoFrame传递给它。

trans-unit.source: If you are extending your own C++ classes to interoperate with VideoOutput, you can either provide a QObject based class with a mediaObject property that exposes a QMediaObject derived class that has a QVideoRendererControl available, or you can provide a QObject based class with a writable videoSurface property that can accept a QAbstractVideoSurface based class and can follow the correct protocol to deliver QVideoFrames to it.

If you are using a pragma library script to store application-wide instance data, consider using a QObject singleton type instead. This should result in better performance, and will result in less JavaScript heap memory being used.

If you are using coordinates with Qt's raster-based paint engine, it is important to note that, while coordinates greater than +/- 215 can be used, any painting performed with coordinates outside this range is not guaranteed to be shown; the drawing may be clipped. This is due to the use of short int in the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将坐标与Qt的基于栅格的绘画引擎一起使用，则需要注意的是，尽管可以使用大于+/- 2 15的坐标，但是不能保证显示坐标超出此范围的任何绘画。该图可能会被剪切。这是由于在实现中使用了 short int 。

trans-unit.target: 如果使用多重继承， moc 会假定第一个继承的类是QObject的子类。另外，请确保只有第一个继承的类是QObject。

trans-unit.target: 如果你的项目中除了Qt提供的库之外,还使用了其他库,你需要在项目文件中指定它们。

If you are using the mouse wheel to adjust the dial, the increment value is determined by the lesser value of wheelScrollLines multipled by singleStep, and pageStep.

trans-unit.source: If you are working with large amounts of filtering and have to invoke invalidateFilter() repeatedly, using beginResetModel() / endResetModel() may be more efficient, depending on the implementation of your model. However, beginResetModel() / endResetModel() returns the proxy model to its original state, losing selection information, and will cause the proxy model to be repopulated.

If you are working with large amounts of filtering and have to invoke invalidateFilter() repeatedly, using reset() may be more efficient, depending on the implementation of your model. However, reset() returns the proxy model to its original state, losing selection information, and will cause the proxy model to be repopulated.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要处理大量过滤操作，并且必须重复调用invalidateFilter（），则根据模型的实现，使用reset（）可能会更有效。但是，reset（）将代理模型返回到其原始状态，丢失选择信息，并且将导致重新填充代理模型。

trans-unit.source: If you assign an Item to the data list, it becomes a child of the Window's contentItem, so that it appears inside the window. The item's parent will be the window's contentItem, which is the root of the Item ownership tree within that Window.
trans-unit.target: 如果将项目分配给数据列表，则该项目将成为Window的contentItem的子项，以便它出现在窗口内。项目的父项将是窗口的contentItem，该内容是该窗口内项目所有权树的根。

trans-unit.source: If you assign an Item to the contentData list, it becomes a child of the window's contentItem, so that it appears inside the window. The item's parent will be the window's contentItem.
trans-unit.target: 如果将Item分配给contentData列表，它将成为窗口contentItem的子项，因此它会出现在窗口内。该项的父项将是窗口的contentItem。

trans-unit.source: If you assign another Window to the data list, the nested window will become "transient for" the outer Window.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将另一个窗口分配给数据列表,嵌套的窗口将成为 "瞬时的 "外部窗口。

trans-unit.source: If you assign any other object type, it is added as a resource.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定任何其他对象类型,它将被添加为资源。

trans-unit.source: If you build Qt directly from the Git repository, you should initialize the repository only with modules which are supported or build and install modules separately. This helps to prevent unexpected build problems.
trans-unit.target: 如果你直接从 Git 仓库中构建 Qt,你应该只用支持的模块初始化仓库,或者单独构建和安装模块。这有助于防止意外的构建问题。

trans-unit.source: If you build Qt from a released source code distribution archive, the configure tool ensures that the build will be made only for modules which are known to build for the target specified. Additionally, you can explicitly exclude unsupported or not needed modules from the build via the -skip <module> option when running the configure tool.
trans-unit.target: 如果您从已发布的源代码分发档案库中构建Qt，则 configure 工具可确保仅针对已知针对指定目标进行构建的模块进行构建。此外，在运行 configure 工具时，可以通过 -skip <module> 选项从构建中明确排除不支持或不需要的模块。

trans-unit.source: If you call read() before a buffer is ready, an invalid buffer will be returned, again without blocking.
trans-unit.target: 如果在缓冲区准备就绪之前调用read（），则会返回一个无效的缓冲区，并且不会阻塞。

trans-unit.source: If you call exactMatch() with an empty pattern on an empty string it will return true; otherwise it returns false since it operates over the whole string. If you call indexIn() with an empty pattern on
trans-unit.target: 如果您在一个空字符串上使用一个空模式调用精确匹配（），它将返回true；否则，将返回true。否则它返回 false ,因为它对整个字符串进行操作。如果您使用空模式调用indexIn（）

trans-unit.source: If you can't parse the entire input in one go (for example, it is huge, or is being delivered over a network connection), data can be fed to the parser in pieces. This is achieved by telling parse() to work incrementally, and making subsequent calls to the parseContinue() function, until all the data has been processed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您无法一次性解析整个输入（例如，巨大的输入或正在通过网络连接传送），则可以将数据分段地馈送到解析器。通过告诉parse（）递增工作，然后对parseContinue（）函数进行后续调用，直到处理完所有数据，即可实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: If you cannot determine a better proxy alternative, use QNetworkProxy::DefaultProxy, which tells the code querying for a proxy to use a higher alternative. For example, if this factory is set to a QNetworkAccessManager object, DefaultProxy will tell it to query the application-level proxy settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不能确定更好的代理替代方案，请使用QNetworkProxy :: DefaultProxy，它告诉查询代理的代码使用更高的替代方案。例如，如果将此工厂设置为QNetworkAccessManager对象，则DefaultProxy将告诉它查询应用程序级代理设置。

trans-unit.source: If you change the color of the legend, the style of the legend brush is set to Qt::SolidPattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改图例的颜色，则图例画笔的样式将设置为Qt :: SolidPattern。

trans-unit.source: If you change the values that a rowHeightProvider or a columnWidthProvider return for rows and columns inside the viewport, you must call forceLayout. This informs TableView that it needs to use the provider functions again to recalculate and update the layout.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改rowHeightProvider或columnWidthProvider为视口内的行和列返回的值，则必须调用forceLayout。这将通知TableView它需要再次使用提供程序功能来重新计算和更新布局。

trans-unit.source: If you change the values that a rowHeightProvider or a columnWidthProvider return for rows and columns inside the viewport, you must call forceLayout. This informs TableView that it needs to use the provider functions again to recalculate and update the layout.

If you choose to represent a gesture by a custom QGesture subclass, you will need to reimplement the create() function to construct instances of your gesture class. Similarly, you may need to reimplement the reset() function if your custom gesture objects need to be specially handled when a gesture is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择通过自定义QGesture子类表示手势，则将需要重新实现create（）函数以构造手势类的实例。同样，如果在取消手势时需要特别处理自定义手势对象，则可能需要重新实现reset（）函数。

trans-unit.source: If you compile Qt yourself, you can configure how Qt uses OpenSSL by setting either the -openssl / -openssl-runtime or -openssl-linked configure flags.

If you create a custom style, you should take special care when drawing asymmetric elements to make sure that they also look correct in a mirrored layout. An easy way to test your styles is to run applications with the -reverse command-line option or to call QApplication::setLayoutDirection() in your main() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建自定义样式，则在绘制非对称元素时应格外小心，以确保它们在镜像布局中也看起来正确。测试样式的一种简单方法是使用 -reverse 命令行选项运行应用程序，或在 main() 函数中调用QApplication :: setLayoutDirection（）。

trans-unit.source: If you create a new widget we strongly recommend that you use the colors in the palette rather than hard-coding specific colors.
trans-unit.target: 如果您创建一个新的小组件,我们强烈建议您使用调色板中的颜色,而不是硬性编码特定的颜色。

trans-unit.source: If you create a subclass of QGraphicsLayoutItem and reimplement its virtual functions, you will enable the layout to resize and position your item along with other QGraphicsLayoutItems including QGraphicsWidget and QGraphicsLayout.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建QGraphicsLayoutItem的子类并重新实现其虚拟功能，则将使布局能够与其他QGraphicsLayoutItems（包括QGraphicsWidget和QGraphicsLayout）一起调整项目的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: If you create a subclass of QGraphicsLayoutItem and reimplement its virtual functions, you will enable the layout to resize and position your item along with other QGraphicsLayoutItems including QGraphicsWidget and QGraphicsLayout.

If you create an element or attribute with QDomDocument::createElement() or QDomDocument::createAttribute(), the prefix will be an empty string. If you use QDomDocument::createElementNS() or QDomDocument::createAttributeNS() instead, the prefix will not be an empty string; but it might be an empty string if the name does not have a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用QDomDocument :: createElement（）或QDomDocument :: createAttribute（）创建元素或属性，则前缀将为空字符串。如果改用QDomDocument :: createElementNS（）或QDomDocument :: createAttributeNS（），则前缀将不是空字符串；但如果名称没有前缀，则该字符串可能为空。

trans-unit.source: If you create multiple database connections, specify a unique connection name for each one, when you call addDatabase(). Use database() with a connection name to get that connection. Use removeDatabase() with a connection name to remove a connection. QSqlDatabase outputs a warning if you try to remove a connection referenced by other QSqlDatabase objects. Use contains() to see if a given connection name is in the list of connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建多个数据库连接，则在调用addDatabase（）时为每个数据库指定唯一的连接名称。使用带有连接名称的database（）来获得该连接。使用带有连接名称的removeDatabase（）来删除连接。如果尝试删除其他QSqlDatabase对象引用的连接，则QSqlDatabase将输出警告。使用contains（）可以查看给定的连接名称是否在连接列表中。

trans-unit.source: If you create multiple database connections, specify a unique connection name for each one, when you call addDatabase(). Use database() with a connection name to get that connection. Use removeDatabase() with a connection name to remove a connection. QSqlDatabase outputs a warning if you try to remove a connection referenced by other QSqlDatabase objects. Use contains() to see if a given connection name is in the list of connections.

If you create new widgets in the mousePressEvent() the mouseReleaseEvent() may not end up where you expect, depending on the underlying window system (or X11 window manager), the widgets' location and maybe more.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在mousePressEvent（）中创建新的小部件，则mouseReleaseEvent（）可能不会在您期望的位置结束，具体取决于基础窗口系统（或X11窗口管理器），小部件的位置，甚至更多。

trans-unit.source: If you develop components you might want to control who is able to instantiate those components. Since the server binary can be shipped to and registered on any client machine it is possible for anybody to use those components in his own software.
trans-unit.target: 如果你开发组件,你可能想控制谁能够实例化这些组件。由于服务器二进制文件可以被运送到任何客户机上并在任何客户机上注册,所以任何人都可以在自己的软件中使用这些组件。

trans-unit.source: If you develop on a Linux machine, you can also run the compositor within a window on your development machine. This lets you run clients in an environment that closely resembles the target device. Without rebuilding the client, you can also run it with -platform wayland to run it inside the compositor. If you use -platform xcb (for X11), you can run the client on the desktop. In other words, you can start developing your clients before the compositor is ready for use.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Linux机器上进行开发，则还可以在开发机器上的窗口中运行合成器。这使您可以在与目标设备非常相似的环境中运行客户端。无需重建客户端，您也可以使用 -platform wayland 来运行它以在合成器中运行它。如果使用 -platform xcb （用于X11），则可以在桌面上运行客户端。换句话说，您可以在准备好使用合成器之前就开始开发客户端。

trans-unit.source: If you did not build Qt with RPATH enabled, you can place the Qt runtime components in any folder in the file system. The following environment variables should point to valid locations assuming that the Qt installation is located in <Qt-install-path>:
trans-unit.target: 如果未在启用RPATH的情况下构建Qt，则可以将Qt运行时组件放置在文件系统中的任何文件夹中。假设Qt安装位于 <Qt-install-path> 中，则以下环境变量应指向有效位置：

trans-unit.source: If you disable a parent item, all its children will also be disabled. If you enable a parent item, all children will be enabled, unless they have been explicitly disabled (i.e., if you call setEnabled(false) on a child, it will not be reenabled if its parent is disabled, and then enabled again).
trans-unit.target: 如果你禁用一个父项,它的所有子项也将被禁用。如果启用父项,所有的子项都将被启用,除非它们被明确地禁用(即,如果你对一个子项调用setEnabled(false),如果它的父项被禁用,它将不会被重新启用,然后再启用)。

trans-unit.source: If you disable the const char * to QString automatic conversion by compiling your software with the macro QT_NO_CAST_FROM_ASCII defined, you'll be very likely to catch any strings you are missing. See QString::fromUtf8() and QString::fromLatin1() for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用定义的宏 QT_NO_CAST_FROM_ASCII 编译软件来禁用将 const char * 转换为QString的自动转换，则很可能会捕获丢失的任何字符串。有关更多信息，请参见QString :: fromUtf8（）和QString :: fromLatin1（）。

If you do not see the entries for the gamepad you are using, check if the joystick package is installed. If not, install the package and grep the dmesg logs again.
trans-unit.target: 如果看不到正在使用的游戏板的条目，请检查是否已安装 joystick 包。如果没有，请安装包，并 grep 的 dmesg 的再次登录。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a format, the format of the decoded audio itself will be used. Otherwise, some format conversion will be applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有指定格式,将使用解码后的音频本身的格式。否则,将应用一些格式转换。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want all plugins added to QTPLUGIN to be automatically linked, remove import_plugins from the CONFIG variable:
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想自动链接添加到QTPLUGIN的所有插件， import_plugins 从 CONFIG 变量中删除import_plugins：

trans-unit.source: If you do not want particles to automatically die after a time, for example if you wish to dispose of them manually, set lifeSpan to Emitter.InfiniteLife.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想让粒子在一段时间后自动死亡,比如你想手动处理它们,可以将lifeSpan设置为Emitter.InfiniteLife。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the line edit to have a context menu, you can set its contextMenuPolicy to Qt::NoContextMenu. If you want to customize the context menu, reimplement this function. If you want to extend the standard context menu, reimplement this function, call createStandardContextMenu() and extend the menu returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不希望行编辑具有上下文菜单，则可以将其contextMenuPolicy设置为Qt :: NoContextMenu。如果要自定义上下文菜单，请重新实现此功能。如果要扩展标准上下文菜单，请重新实现此功能，调用createStandardContextMenu（）并扩展返回的菜单。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the text edit to have a context menu, you can set its contextMenuPolicy to Qt::NoContextMenu. If you want to customize the context menu, reimplement this function. If you want to extend the standard context menu, reimplement this function, call createStandardContextMenu() and extend the menu returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不希望文本编辑具有上下文菜单，则可以将其contextMenuPolicy设置为Qt :: NoContextMenu。如果要自定义上下文菜单，请重新实现此功能。如果要扩展标准上下文菜单，请重新实现此功能，调用createStandardContextMenu（）并扩展返回的菜单。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the text edit to have a context menu, you can set its contextMenuPolicy to Qt::NoContextMenu. If you want to customize the context menu, reimplement this function. If you want to extend the standard context menu, reimplement this function, call createStandardContextMenu() and extend the menu returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不希望文本编辑具有上下文菜单，则可以将其contextMenuPolicy设置为Qt :: NoContextMenu。如果要自定义上下文菜单，请重新实现此功能。如果要扩展标准上下文菜单，请重新实现此功能，调用createStandardContextMenu（）并扩展返回的菜单。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to include all data contained in the model, or the autogenerated rows and columns are not ordered as you wish, you can specify which rows and columns should be included and in which order by defining an explicit list of categories for either or both of rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想包含模型中包含的所有数据,或者自动生成的行和列没有按照您的意愿排序,您可以通过为行和列中的任何一个或两个定义一个明确的类别列表来指定哪些行和列应该被包含,以及按什么顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to provide plugins for your accessibility interfaces, you can use an interface factory (QAccessible::InterfaceFactory), which is the recommended way to provide accessible interfaces in a statically-linked application.
trans-unit.target: 如果不想为可访问性接口提供插件，则可以使用接口工厂（QAccessible :: InterfaceFactory），这是在静态链接的应用程序中提供可访问接口的推荐方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use the SQLite library included with Qt, you can pass -system-sqlite to the configure script to use the SQLite libraries of the operating system. This is recommended whenever possible, as it reduces the installation size and removes one component for which you need to track security advisories.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想使用Qt附带的SQLite库，则可以将 -system-sqlite 传递给configure脚本以使用操作系统的SQLite库。建议尽可能地这样做，因为它会减小安装大小并删除您需要跟踪安全公告的一个组件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use the SQLite library included with Qt, you can pass -system-sqlite to the configure script to use the SQLite libraries of the operating system. This is recommended whenever possible, as it reduces the installation size and removes one component for which you need to track security advisories.
